name: Three Of Us (GJ The Game Dev)
name_original: Three Of Us (GJ The Game Dev)
description:
Three Of Us is a minimalistic puzzle game inspired by three body orbits. 

Click, drag and release to set the position, speed and direction of the ball. Balls are connected to each other by gravity. Balls that collide will fuse together into darker balls. Collect all the rings with the corresponding colored balls to complete each level. 

Made by GJ The Game Dev.
